response.overview: Li Yunfeng, who originally had excellent martial arts skills, enters the stone village to take revenge on the enemy who killed his parents and to protect his only surviving woman, Yuei. After endless training, Li Yunfeng has been reborn as the best Moorim expert. Then one day, Li Yunfeng hears a shocking rumor that his master, Lan Guangyi, is the one who killed his parents. Stone village people in chaos. Li Yunfeng believes there must be some hidden ruse, and sets out to find the truth beyond it. What is the truth that the absolute Moorim master will face?
response.title: Eight Trigram Boxing 2
